banner.title: Not sure where to begin? Take the quiz!
banner.text: Receive a personalized checklist to guide you through retirement.

sections.title: Learn about your retirement income choices
sections.body: Prepare for old age by exploring retirement income sources and learn how to manage your money after you retire.

cards.title: Main sources of retirement income
cards.body: See the different types of retirement income you could have. Look at your current income sources and find potential gaps.

cards.title: Planning to save for retirement
cards.body: Learn about how the income youâ€™ll need in retirement will change. Your financial needs and considerations will also change.

sections.title: Making retirement decisions
sections.body: Feel more confident about your choices in retirement. Use these resources to better understand your options and their impact on your public pensions.

cards.title: Deciding when to start your public pensions
cards.body: Flexible public pensions offer choices for retirement. Learn how to choose and what to consider.

cards.title: Going from work to retirement
cards.body: You can choose different ways to go from work to retirement. Retiring from work and starting your public pensions are two different things.

cards.title: Rules of thumb for your public pensions
cards.body: Check out these tips to help you decide when to start your public pensions. Choose what is right for you.

sections.title: Retirement stories
sections.body: Not sure when to retire? Read the stories that people shared with us. Learn about the different choices and compare them to your personal situation.

cards.title: Fred decides when to start his public pensions
cards.body: Fred decides when to start his OAS pension and CPP retirement pension to take the largest amount available to him.

cards.title: Bonnie delays to reduce the savings she needs
cards.body: Bonnie will need less savings to retire comfortably if she delays her OAS pension and her CPP retirement pension.

cards.title: Keith collects his public pensions while working
cards.body: Keith chooses between delaying his public pensions or taking Post-Retirement Benefits while working.
